About.paragraph: The first chat bot dedicated to supporting newcomers to Solana.
Why: We seek grants and donations from foundations, organizations, and individuals who share our vision and are interested in supporting projects that benefit the blockchain community
Receive non-monetary contributions like technical expertise, resources, software tools, or marketing assistance.

Features.title: Answer the questions
Features.text: Summarize documents, answer questions about Solana from updated information in documents quickly.

Features.title: Update the latest information
Features.text: Update the latest information about Solana, the latest news, the latest events, the latest projects.

Features.title: Generate Image
Features.text: Perform automated actions such as minting (creating) NFTs, generating captions for the created NFTs, and even automatically selling them.
